Commands.Shooting Star: 2-HIT BRV attack.  2nd hit is dealt to all enemies (AoE).  Turns to Shooting Star+ after use if the ability breaks the target or hits a broken target.
Commands.Shooting Star+: 2-HIT BRV attack.  2nd hit is dealt to all enemies (AoE).  Turns to Shooting Star after use.  If the ability hits the target, the user's next turn is moved right before the target's turn.
Commands.Death Drop: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Turns to Death Drop+ after use if the ability breaks the target or hits a broken target.
Commands.Death Drop+: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Grants 1 stack of Royal Arms if STR 60 Passive is equipped.  Turns back to Death Drop after use.  If the ability hits the target, the user's next turn is moved right before the target's turn.
Commands.Warp-Strike: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants Small Attack Up for 5 turns.  Turns into Warp-Strike+ after use if the ability breaks the target or hits a broken target.  This ability replaces Death Drop.  Requires Airstep Sword's passive.
Commands.Warp-Strike+: 1-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants Small Attack Up for 5 turns.  Grants 1 stack of Royal Arms if STR 60 Passive is equipped.  Turns into Warp-Strike after use.  If the ability hits the target, the user's next turn is moved right before the target's turn.  Royal Arms grants one additional hit to the user's abilities and for each additional stack, increases Max BRV (max stacks is 5).  Requires Airstep Sword's passive.
Commands.Set Warp Advance: Turns all abilities to their + variants.  BRV stolen can overflow by a small amount for 2 turns.  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Conjure Armiger: 12-HIT BRV+HP attack.  Grants 2 stacks of Royal Arms (Armiger) for 5 turns.  Royal Arms grants one additional hit to the user's abilities and for each additional stack, increases Max BRV (max stacks is 5).

Passives.Shooting Star Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Shooting Star and Shooting Star+.
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Back Attack: Slightly raises BRV Damage when attacking an enemy not targeting self.
Passives.Death Drop Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Death Drop, Death Drop+, Warp-Strike and Warp-Strike+.
Passives.Smash Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after initiating a Chase Sequence.
Passives.Shooting Star Charge: Increases the max uses of Shooting Star by 1.
Passives.Death Drop Charge: Increases the max uses of Death Drop by 1.
Passives.The Prince's Will: Slightly raises Max BRV and Attack if HP is Max when the final battle starts.
Passives.Buff Boost&Speed All: Moderately raises party's Max BRV and slightly raises their Speed while buffed.
Passives.Shooting Star Extend: When using Shooting Star:- Inflicts Point Blank Warp to all enemies for 3 turns.When using Shooting Star/+:- Greatly raises its potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.- Triggers an HP attack after use.- Slightly improves the 5 turns Max BRV Up buff and extends its duration by 3 turns.When using Shooting Star+:- When target is afflicted with Point Blank Warp, triggers an additional 2-HIT ranged BRV+HP attack.- Initiates a Chase Sequence.Point Blank Warp lowers Defense.
Passives.Buff Attack&Speed Up: Moderately raises Attack and slightly raises Speed while buffed.
Passives.Death Drop Extend:
Increases the max uses of Death Drop by 2.When using Death Drop or Warp-Strike:- Inflicts Point Blank Warp to target for 3 turns.When using Death Drop/+ or Warp-Strike/+:- Increases the number of BRV hits to 2.- Tremendously raises its total potency.- BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV.- Slightly improves the 5 turns Attack Up and extends its duration by 3 turns.When using Death Drop+ or Warp-Strike+:- Grants 1 stack of Royal Arms for 5 turns (max is 5).- When target is afflicted with Point Blank Warp, triggers an additional 2-HIT ranged BRV+HP attack.While Royal Arms is active:- Turns BRV Attack to BRV Attack+ and HP Attack to HP Attack+.- BRV Attack+ has the following effects: + 1-HIT ranged BRV attack with a moderate potency increase. + Triggers another BRV hit (Royal Arms effect).- HP Attack+ has the following effects:
+ 1-HIT ranged BRV+HP attack. + Triggers another BRV hit (Royal Arms effect).While Royal Arms V is active:- Turns BRV Attack+ to BRV Attack++ and HP Attack+ to HP Attack++.- BRV Attack++ has the following effects:
+ Increases the number of BRV hits to 2. + Tremendously raises its potency.- HP Attack++ has the following effects + Slightly raises its potency. + When target is afflicted with Point Blank Warp, triggers an additional 2-HIT ranged BRV+HP attack.
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%.
Passives.Set Warp Advance Extend: When using Set Warp Advance, adds the following effects:- Slightly raises the overflow limit.

Weapons.Engine Blade CP: 15: Increases the potency of Shooting Star and Shooting Star+.Grants Small Max BRV Up for 5 turns after using Shooting Star or Shooting Star+.
Weapons.Sword of a Twilight Prince CP: 15: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Shooting Star ,  Shooting Star+ ,  Death Drop ,  Death Drop+ ,  Warp-Strike  and  Warp-Strike+
Weapons.Bloom Stone CP: Cannot be equipped: Increases the max uses of Set Warp Advance by 1.Extends the duration of its effects by 2 turns.
Weapons.Rune Saber CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Conjure Armiger.
Weapons.Airstep Sword CP: 35: Turns Death Drop to Warp-Strike (BRV+HP attack).Grants Small Attack Up for 5 turns after using Warp Strike or Warp Strike+.
